comment.author: 14463685@N07
comment._content: A little more light around the left eye and this would be a perfect portrait.  The man's character is well captured; a bright, open and engaging personality, a real Australian.

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/14463685@N07] He certainly looks like a real character :)
